summary: An Italian submarine captain tries to navigate his sub through enemy waters whilst being stalked by a British commander (James Mason). The Italian sub manages to make it into the neutral port of Tangiers, followed by the British commander.
cast: Lilli Palmer|James Mason|Gabriele Ferzetti|Alberto Lupo|Valeria Fabrizi|Renato De Carmine|Daniele Vargas|Andrew Keir|Gabriele Tinti|Jeremy Burnham|Paul Muller|Gianni Solaro|Andrea Checchi|Geoffrey Keen|Fortunato Arena|Giovanni Cianfriglia|Fanfulla|Gaia Germani|Anna McDonald|Davide Montemurri|Gino Pernice|Aldo Pini|Mimmo Poli|Sal Borgese
title: Hasta el fin de la tempestad
